properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ni wakati wa amani,
yesu atupenda,
amani yake Bwana,
yesu atupenda.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ye ye ye
ye ye ye.
Yesu atupenda,
wo wo wo
wo wo wo,
Yesu atupenda. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ni wakati wa upendo,
yesu atupenda,
upendo wake Bwana,
yesu atupenda.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ni wakati wa baraka,
yesu atupenda,
baraka yake Bwana,
yesu atupenda.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ni wakati wa fadhili,
yesu atupenda,
fadhili yake Bwana,
yesu atupenda.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Ni wakati wa neema,
yesu atupenda,
neema yake Bwana,
yesu atupenda.
